content: for the back starting with row 2 using a larger needle cast off loosely in rib �5 buttonhole band with right side of work facing you using 3 25 needles and main colour pick up and knit 27 sts starting approximately 4 inches 10 cms from the top of the neckband on the left front edge row 1 - k1 p1b repeat to last st k1 row 2 buttonhole row p1 k1b p1 k1b yf k2tog tbl * p1 k1b 4 times yf k2tog tbl ** repeat from * to ** once p1 next row - k1 p1b repeat to last st k1 next row - p1 k1b p1 repeat to end cast off in rib button band with right side of work facing you using 3 25 needles and main colour starting at the neck on the left sleeve pick up and knit 27 stitches to correspond with the button hole band row 1 k1 p1b k1 repeat to end cast off in rib making up sew in all ends and lightly press pieces according to instructions on wool band join remaining seams using mattress stitch overlap the button hole band at the raglan fasten down the button band underneath it and sew on buttons key for bird chart 1 and borders chosen colour for bird b contrast a main colour m border 1 border 2 �6 sleeve border if you have any problems with this design please don t hesitate to contact me @janereay55@hotmail co uk or you can 7� message me on my instagram @janereayknits copyright 2022 janereayknits �7
